title: Frankenstein
summaries: Frankensteins are Hardmode Enemies that only spawn during a Solar Eclipse. During which, they are as common as Zombies are at night. However, they hit much harder, have more life, and walk faster.

On the <linked>[img:Old-gen console version]</linked><linked> Old-gen console version</linked> and <linked>Nintendo 3DS</linked><linked>[img:Nintendo 3DS version]</linked><linked> version</linked>, they can drop the <linked>Broken Hero Sword</linked>, which is a <linked>Crafting material</linked> necessary for crafting the <linked>Terra Blade</linked>.

statistics.Damage: 65/130/195
statistics.Max Life: 350/700/1050
statistics.KB Resist: 70%/73%/76%
